name: Ch.4BaseConvo3
_source: speak;Moulder;Vanessa...|What is with all these weapons and books laying around?
speak;Vanessa;Oh, Father Moulder.|I'm pondering over some training, see...
speak;Moulder;Pondering over training?|What's so ponderous about it?
speak;Vanessa;I was just thinking...|Princess Tana is quite magically talented, and my sister Syrene is pretty strong...|Yet, I feel like I lack both.
speak;Moulder;Ah... I see.|Yet, you doubt yourself far too much.|Be confident, Vanessa!|You are strong in your own way!
speak;Vanessa;But I want to be better...there's no point being complacent.|What do you think, Father Moulder?|Should I train my body futher, or my mind?
speak;Moulder;Hmmmmm...|If you're set on it...|I would say training in both would be wise.|Though, I don't think that's the answer you're looking for...|What is your heart telling you?
choice;VanessaChoice;Train in STR or MAG for Vanessa?;STR,MAG
speak;Vanessa;I will train like my sister.|It has always been my dream to be like her.
speak;Moulder;I'm glad to see your dedication to be like your sister.|Though, always remember that we love you for who you are, too.
speak;Vanessa;Thank you, Father Moulder.|I appreciate all that you do for all of us.
speak;Moulder;Anytime, Vanessa.|Good luck with your training.
